backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining access control, school and user profile storage, and daily report management with role-based authorization.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file providing brief summaries of key frontend components for fast reference during build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining design tokens, color variables, and base styles for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point that loads the React app and sets metadata and app icon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication, role-based routing, and admin view switching.
frontend/src/components/admin/ActiveScho: Displays a searchable table of active schools with loading/error states and opens an edit dialog for selected schools.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminSumma: Shows summary cards for total active schools and number of reports submitted for a selected date.
frontend/src/components/admin/AnalyticsS: Generates trend and completion analytics from daily reports and renders charts with loading fallbacks.
frontend/src/components/admin/DailyProgr: Displays completion badges for various report categories based on submitted scores and attached data.
frontend/src/components/admin/EditSchool: Modal form allowing admins to edit a school’s details and update them through a mutation.
frontend/src/components/admin/KepsekProf: Form for registering a principal with a school profile, validating input and saving via mutation.
frontend/src/components/admin/Monitoring: Displays a sortable daily monitoring table for admins, showing school status, progress, and report details with loading skeletons and detail modal support.
frontend/src/components/admin/ReportDeta: Shows a dialog with full report details including attendance photo, times, scores, and school info for a selected monitoring row.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header component with branding and logout handling that clears identity and query cache.
frontend/src/components/kepsek/Attendanc: Handles selecting, validating, previewing, and uploading an attendance photo with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/kepsek/DailyRepo: Form for principals to submit or edit daily reports including photo, times, task completion, and score calculation.
frontend/src/components/kepsek/ProfileSe: Dialog for principals to set up school profile information and save it through an API call.
frontend/src/components/kepsek/TodaySubm: Displays a summary of today’s submitted report with scores, photo, and an option to edit.
frontend/src/components/StatusPills.tsx: Reusable badges for displaying scores, submission status, and category completion with color-coded variants.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout helpers, and initializes AuthClient with stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for roles, school data, daily reports, and mutations tied to the authenticated actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with light/dark theme variables and global styling rules.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility for merging Tailwind class names using clsx and twMerge.
frontend/src/localization/dashboardId.ts: Contains Indonesian localization strings for admin and principal dashboards.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AccessDeniedPage.tsx: UI page shown when access is denied, offering logout, principal ID copy, and retrying role checks.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders the admin dashboard with date selection, summary cards, analytics, active schools, and monitoring table.
frontend/src/pages/AdminKepsekManagement: Provides UI for admins to register and manage school principal profiles, including a form toggle and guidance alert.
frontend/src/pages/KepsekDashboardPage.t: Displays the Kepsek dashboard with school/profile loading states, today’s report status, and daily reporting form logic.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Shows a login screen using Internet Identity with branding and a sign‑in button.
frontend/src/utils/candidOption.ts: Utility functions to unwrap Candid optional values and handle optional ExternalBlob URLs safely.
frontend/src/utils/dayKey.ts: Provides helpers to normalize dates to nanosecond day keys for daily report storage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, layout settings, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing features, issues, and a pending request to auto‑assign the Kepsek role during school profile updates.
